function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relying solely on physical connections for spatial analysis may overlook other modes of disease transmission, such as airborne or surface-based transmission.","Impact":"Increases the risk of failing to identify potential disease transmission pathways, leading to ineffective mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Incorporate additional metrics for disease transmission, such as air flow patterns and surface contact points, into spatial analysis.","Technologies":"Integrated environmental sensors, simulation software for airflow modeling, surface material analysis tools.","People":"Building designers, public health experts, facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, public health agencies."}]}
